>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/collaboration-spaces/{spaceId}/logs/deployment"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get x most recent lines of the output generated by the deployment of a cage

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"spaceId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"in":"query","name":"tail_lines","schema":{"type":"integer"},"required":false}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of latest `tail_lines` deployment logs","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}},"401":{"description":"User is not authenticated","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}},"404":{"description":"Resource not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error_message":{"type":"string","default":"Document not found"}},"required":["error_message"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
